body:
```console
$ spack install amber 

==> Installing amber
==> Searching for binary cache of amber
==> No binary for amber found: installing from source
curl: (37) Couldn't open file //Amber18.tar.bz2
==> Fetching file:////Amber18.tar.bz2
==> Fetching from file:////Amber18.tar.bz2 failed.
==> Error: FetchError: All fetchers failed for spack-stage-amber-18-h2w543lspv6idg4laq5pff7jy4mgqbry

/opt/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py:1079, in do_fetch:
       1076                raise FetchError("Will not fetch %s" %
       1077                                 self.spec.format('{name}{@version}'), ck_msg)
       1078
  >>   1079        self.stage.create()
       1080        self.stage.fetch(mirror_only)
       1081        self._fetch_time = time.time() - start_time
       1082


The command '/bin/sh -c spack install amber@18 &&     spack clean --all' returned a non-zero code: 1
```

### Platform and user environment

Please report your OS here:
```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux 4ab8260181a4 3.10.0-957.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Thu Nov 8 23:39:32 UTC 2018 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
Description:	Ubuntu 16.04 
```
title: Installation Issue: Amber
